name: Confluent Kafka Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix and publish it to a topic in Confluent Cloud

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: Name of the Quix input topic to listen to.

Variables.Name: kafka_topic
Variables.Description: Name of the Confluent Kafka topic to sink data to

Variables.Name: kafka_key
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal

Variables.Name: kafka_secret
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal

Variables.Name: kafka_broker_address
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal
